Class JavaLine

java.lang.Object
  JavaLine

 class JavaLine
extends java.lang.Object

Stores a line of a Java program for later analysis

Constructor Summary

          Constructor
 
Method Summary

          Return the length of the Java part of the stored line.

static java.lang.String spaces(int number)
          Return a string of 'number' spaces.
static java.lang.String trimTrailing(java.lang.String code)
          Removes the trailing whitespace from the code, left from the gap to the comment, by iterating backwards through the string until there is a non-whitespace character, then creating a string of the characters up to that point.

Method Detail

getJavaLineLength

public int getJavaLineLength()
Return the length of the Java part of the stored line.
 JavaLine j = new JavaLine("int a; // Declaration");
 int jp = j.getJavaLineLength();
 Would set jp the be 6

Returns:
The length of the Java code in the line

returnLineWithCommentAt

public java.lang.String returnLineWithCommentAt(int pos)
Return as an 'indented' line with the // comment starting at column pos
 JavaLine j = new JavaLine("int a; // Declaration");
 String res = j.returnLineWithCommentAt(10);
 Would set res to be the following string:
 int a;   // Declaration

Parameters:
pos - Start // comment at pos
Returns:
A new version of the line with any // comment starting at column pos.

spaces

public static java.lang.String spaces(int number)
Return a string of 'number' spaces.

Parameters:
number - of spaces required
Returns:
A string of 'number' spaces

trimTrailing

public static java.lang.String trimTrailing(java.lang.String code)
Removes the trailing whitespace from the code, left from the gap to the comment, by iterating backwards through the string until there is a non-whitespace character, then creating a string of the characters up to that point.

Parameters:
the - string to remove trailing whitespace from
Returns:
the string with trailing whitespaces removed
